body: I need translation, everyone will die... in future

@Euphorism You are right but saying that wont stop others from asking translations anyway so in a way saying that is also pointless. Damn, I talked meta. Leaving that aside it makes me wonder  why is this uploaded  on a hentai site even though there are zero sex scenes in it. And it's even a manga  not a doujinshi which means it was published in a magazine.

So...from what I understand...Chick who dude liked gets abducted by Demon King, corrupted into demon herself and becomes his wife. He goes to seek revenge and they cast a spell on him to make him their daughter. Later on he finds the coin and all his memories come back and he runs away. Anyone else understand that?
